items.sentence: Tom didn\'t believe the rumor about Mary and John.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was planning to talk to.
Tom doesn\'t go to the same school that Mary does.
Tom must be shown how to do what needs to be done.
Tom must stay in the hospital for at least a week.
Tom needs to hear the bad news directly from Mary.
Tom needs to return this book by tomorrow evening.
Tom never found out the truth about Mary and John.
Tom never found out the truth about what Mary did.
I\'m actually looking forward to seeing Tom again.
